alert.note: Alert for Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:26AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Rapides, northern Beauregard, Vernon Parishes in west central Louisiana and northern Newton Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 525 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Anacoco to near Bivens. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Leesville, Newton, Rosepine, Merryville, Anacoco, Fort Polk, Slagle, Toledo Bend Dam, Burkeville, New Llano, Hornbeck, Hutton, Mayflower, Kurthwood, Junction, Stringtown, Lacamp, Fullerton and Clifton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
